ygData.subject: Re: JBoots
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool, since I m almost Lvl 18 I don t have too much longer to wait then I guess me and my friend will be off to grab a few JBoots. **************************
ygData.messageBody:
Cool, since I'm almost Lvl 18 I don't have too much longer to wait then I
guess me and my friend will be off to grab a few JBoots.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 17 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************


> From: "Lanadina the Magician" <lanadina@...>
>
> Azor,
>
> Drezlna is only level 25. When I went to get the boots, I was in a group
> with a level 22 Magician, Me(level 25 at the time) and a level 30 wizard.
We
> did just fine.
>
> Lanadina
>
>
> >From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] JBoots
> >Date: Sat, 10 Jul 1999 15:31:08 -0400
> >
> >From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
> >
> >Today on the EQ newsgroup someone posted this message about the jboots.
> >
> >"Recently it seems that the Devs have implemented a way so that
Journeyman
> >Boots can no longer be traded from person to person by means of looting
> >corpses. This new rule irritates me, to say the least. I am deleting my
> >account and trying to give the boots to a friend whom I do not want to
see
> >wasting away while camping for his own pair. Isn't there some way to
trade
> >the darned things? If not, this only heightens the camping problem. Call
me
> >a twink if you will. I prefer to call myself practical"
> >
> >I went on to post....
> >
> >"From what I've heard you can not trade, sell or drop the jboots. I
agree
> >tho if you have to get them yourself and from what I've heard about
getting
> >them takes forever it just makes camping worse then before. Cause now
> >you'll have tons of Lvl 35-40s sitting around waiting for the NPC to
spawn
> >in hopes that it'll have the jboots".
> >
> >Or at least I think it's around Lvl 35-40 for the JBoots.
> >
> >**************************
> >Azor
> >Lvl 16 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> >**************************
> >
